Content: 12 *p48364a01232*   do not write in this area  do not write in this area  do not write in this area 14 low-activity, sealed radioactive sources are used in schools to demonstrate the properties  of ionising radiations.  three sources have been mixed up.   the sources and the radiations that they emit are shown in the table. source radiation emitted americium    radium         strontium        (a) state what is meant by the activity of a radioactive source. (1)      *(b) describe an experiment using absorbers of different materials that could be carried  out to identify the sources.     you must explain how the data collected could be used to distinguish between the  three sources.
